function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to virus during the experiment","Impact":"Potential infection of host cells","Mitigation":"Use proper personal protective equipment (PPE) and handle virus in a biosafety level 2 (BSL-2) laboratory","Technologies":"Biosafety cabinets, autoclaves, disinfectants","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management"},{"Description":"Contamination of laboratory surfaces and equipment","Impact":"Risk of spreading the virus to other areas of the laboratory","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces and equipment, proper waste disposal","Technologies":"Disinfectants, autoclaves, UV irradiation","People":"Laboratory personnel, cleaning staff","Owner":"Laboratory management"},{"Description":"Incorrect calculation of TCID 50 and PFU/ml","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of virus concentration","Mitigation":"Use proper statistical methods for calculation, double-check calculations, peer review of results","Technologies":"Statistical software, data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"}]}
